main.description: GohanGo!! is a collection of 8,866 algorithmically generated NFTs living on the Solana blockchain. Every GohanGo!! NFT features a different set of unique attributes.

home.backstories:
Gohan is a monkey who loves to eat rice, his dream is to try out all the rice dishes in the world!

Hainanese chicken rice, Katsudon, Curry rice, Nasi goreng, Risotto, Jambalaya, Bibimbap, Biryani, you name it, there are just countless of them. How can the world live without rice?

Let’s join the GohanGo!! family, let all the rice lovers build the world together!

promo.title: For Rice Lover
promo.description: Do you know rice feeds more than half of the world's population? We want to share our love for rice with all of you.

promo.title:
Community
First
promo.description: Always start with the community. Keeping building and respecting our community is the #1 thing of GohanGo!!. We want to build the funniest and healthiest community in the Sonala NFT community.

promo.title: Something Different
promo.description: We don't want to be yet another NFT project, we want to be "the" NFT project in the Solana blockchain. We want to support those who are in need in the world, that’s why a portion of our royalties will be used for charities.

steps.title: Building
steps.headline: Building the project
description: Create an official Discord server and Twitter account
Continue the creation of our beatify hand drawn artwork
NFT creation and minting functionality building

steps.title: Community
steps.headline: Building the community
description: Continue to develop and expand our community
More Discord functionality building, games, and special events are incoming

steps.title: More
steps.headline: More and more to come
description: Holders exclusive tools building (Rarity chart, marketplace...)

questions.question: Wen, how and where?
questions.answer: We are scheduled to go live with our NFT project on March 15th on the Solana blockchain. You will only be able to MINT them on our official website. Please follow our Twitter account and join our Discord server to get the latest updates from us!

questions.question: Why should I but GohanGo!! NFT?
questions.answer: You are not only just getting a piece of JPEG, you are getting a unique NFT that was hand-drawn and randomly assembled. They are all living on the Solana blockchain, owning one of the GohanGo!! NFTs means you get access to community-wide events, giveaways and early access to any further generations and drops.

questions.question: Which GohanGo!! NFT will I get?
questions.answer: No one knows! They will all be distributed randomly, whether good or bad. The good thing is all the 8,866 NFTs are unique, they all look pretty and special!

questions.question: How much will the mint cost?

base.warningMsg: You will be able to connect your wallet and mint your GohanGo!! NFT when mint is live, thanks!
